recommendations: Murugesh B. “I have had the opportunity to interact with Adnan when he was an intern at our department. I always amazed with his deep knowledge and wisdom about various topics. We have spent hours talking about human evolution, culture, relationships, societal pressure etc. He always had a very interesting view points. I'm sure he was well deserved to earn a seat at IIT KGP. Also he would bring a great atmosphere wherever he is in. Wish him all success :)”
